{{NJSchoolDistrict | name=Mahwah Township Public Schools | superintendent=Dr. Charles Montesano | businessadmin=Edward Deptula | address=60 Ridge Road
Mahwah, NJ 07430 | website=http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us | schools=6 | enrollment=3,499 (as of 2008-09) | faculty=261.3 | ratio=13.4 | DFG=I | year=2009 | graderange=K-12 | enrollrange=1,801-3,500 | rangecount=70 | ind1dist=13371 | ind1rank=50 | ind1avg=13632 | ind2dist=7786 | ind2rank=46 | ind2avg=8035 | ind6dist=2060 | ind6rank=55 | ind6avg=2166 | ind8dist=1637 | ind8rank=60 | ind8avg=1379 | ind10dist=1464 | ind10rank=29 | ind10avg=1674 | ind13dist=381 | ind13rank=45 | ind13avg=258 | ind16dist=65495| ind16rank=64 | ind16avg=57597}} The '''Mahwah Township Public Schools''' is a comprehensive community public [[school district]] that serves students in Kindergarten through twelfth grade from [[Mahwah, New Jersey|Mahwah]], in [[Bergen County, New Jersey|Bergen County]], [[New Jersey]], United States. As of the 2008-09 school year, the district's six schools had an enrollment of 3,499 students and 261.3 classroom teachers (on an [[full-time equivalent|FTE]] basis), for a [[studentâteacher ratio]] of 13.4.[http://nces.ed.gov/ccd/districtsearch/district_detail.asp?Search=2&details=1&ID2=3409330&DistrictID=3409330 District information for the Mahwah Township School District], [[National Center for Education Statistics]]. Accessed March 31, 2011. The district is classified by the [[New Jersey Department of Education]] as being in [[District Factor Group]] "I", the second highest of eight groupings. District Factor Groups organize districts statewide to allow comparison by common [[socioeconomic]] characteristics of the local districts. From lowest socioeconomic status to highest, the categories are A, B, CD, DE, FG, GH, I and J.[http://www.state.nj.us/education/finance/sf/dfg.shtml NJ Department of Education District Factor Groups (DFG) for School Districts], [[New Jersey Department of Education]]. Accessed December 8, 2009. == Schools == Schools in the district (with 2008-09 enrollment data from the [[National Center for Education Statistics]][http://nces.ed.gov/ccd/schoolsearch/school_list.asp?Search=1&DistrictID=3409330 Mahwah Township Public Schools], [[National Center for Education Statistics]]. Accessed March 31, 2011.) are: ;Elementary Schools *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?siteid=11 Lenape Meadows] (PreK-3; 481 students) *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?siteid=8 Betsy Ross] (K-3; 305 students) *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?siteid=10 George Washington School] (K-3; 259 students) *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?siteid=6 Joyce Kilmer School] (4-5; 537 students) ;Middle School *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?siteid=12 Ramapo Ridge Middle School] (6-8; 887 students) ;High School *[[Mahwah High School]] (9-12; 1,030 students) == Administration == Core members of the district's administration are:[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/applications/web_cms/index.php?pageid=36&menuid=40 Mahwah Administration Information], Mahwah Township Public Schools. Accessed March 31, 2011.[http://www.state.nj.us/cgi-bin/education/directory/directory1.pl?string=co_code03&maxhits=1000 Bergen County School Directory], [[New Jersey Department of Education]]. Accessed November 5, 2009. *Dr. Charles Montesano, Superintendent *Edward Deptula, Business Administrator / Board Secretary ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.mahwah.k12.nj.us/ Mahwah Township Public Schools] *{{NJReportCard|03|2900|0|Mahwah Township Public Schools}} *[http://nces.ed.gov/ccd/schoolsearch/school_list.asp?Search=1&DistrictID=3409330 Mahwah Township Public Schools], [[National Center for Education Statistics]] *[http://www.themsf.org/ The Mahwah Schools Foundation] *[http://www.themsf.org/MSF-Events/10kRace-Main.php The Mahwah 10k Race] {{coord|41.090833|-74.156904|region:US_type:edu|display=title}} {{Bergen County, New Jersey School Districts}} [[Category:Mahwah, New Jersey]] [[Category:New Jersey District Factor Group I]] [[Category:School districts in Bergen County, New Jersey]]
